Articles.Content:
Sorry if this video seems less edited then most of mine. I'm in the middle of finals and I probably shouldn't be editing at all. ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

Regardless, I hope you like my most recent video, Kerbal Parkour Program.

Enjoy~

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/AE1346uOKJs?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Just the thought of kerbal parkour makes me laugh ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Nice video, enjoyed it.
Awesome! I guess Jeb's too cool for stairs.
You know what would be more awesome? A download for the persistent file of this save ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> You know what would be more awesome? A download for the persistent file of this save ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I'll be making a challenge thread when I get the chance ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
Nice, that's some Assasins' Creed-level Kerballing right there.

> 
> Nice, that's some Assasins' Creed-level Kerballing right there.

Thank you! I love the Assassin's creed series and I was sort of inspired by the games to make this video. I at least gained a good library of obstacles I could use in the future from playing through. BTW I put the map in a challenge post. If you look in the video description on YouTube I added a link. You might have some fun trying yourself. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
How in the name of Kraken did you set this up? The idea is wonderful (and never even occurred that it could be possible) and I can't wait too try it myself.
